con:configuration.script: def sdf = new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd") return sdf.format(new Date()) + "T08:59:00.000-04:00"

con:request.name: SubmitPPIPayment-QA562

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="https://www.velocitypayment.com/ws" xmlns:ppi="http://www.ePayments.com/PPI" xmlns:ppip="http://www.ePayments.com/PPIPayment"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:SubmitPPIPayment> <!--Optional:--> <ws:token> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:PPITransactionRequestId>${DataSourceACHAbuse#RequestID}</ppi:PPITransactionRequestId> <ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken>${DataSourceACHAbuse#IdentifierToken}</ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken> </ws:token> <!--Optional:--> <ws:payment Notes=""> <!--Optional:--> </ppi:Fees> <ppi:PaymentSegment> <ppip:Amount>20.00</ppip:Amount> <ppip:SegmentType>Enter Amount</ppip:SegmentType> <!--Optional:--> </ppi:PaymentSegment> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:PaymentType>Regular</ppi:PaymentType> <ppi:ProcessDate>${DataGenDateTest#TodayDate}</ppi:ProcessDate> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> </ppi:AdditionalInfo> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Customer> <ppi:AddressLine1>1853 Mandan Terrace</ppi:AddressLine1> <ppi:FirstName>Himan</ppi:FirstName> <ppi:LastName>Verma</ppi:LastName> <ppi:Zip>21054</ppi:Zip> </ppi:Customer> <ppi:ClientAccountNumber>12345</ppi:ClientAccountNumber> <ppi:PreAuthorizeOnly>false</ppi:PreAuthorizeOnly> <ppi:PaymentSource>Agent</ppi:PaymentSource> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Payor> <!--Optional:--> road</ppi:AddressLine1> <ppi:PhoneNumber>(717) 983-2345</ppi:PhoneNumber> <ppi:FirstName>Michael</ppi:FirstName> <ppi:LastName>Clarke</ppi:LastName> <ppi:EmailAddress>imtiazster@gmail.com</ppi:EmailAddress> <ppi:ZipCode>21054</ppi:ZipCode> <ppi:BusinessName>My Business</ppi:BusinessName><ppi:IsBusinessName>false</ppi:IsBusinessName> </ppi:Payor> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Vehicle> <!--Optional:--> <ppip:AbaNumber>${DataSourceACHAbuse#ABAnumber}</ppip:AbaNumber><ppip:AccountType>${DataSourceACHAbuse#AccountType}</ppip:AccountType> <!--Optional:-->
